data.fullContent: Over the past two decades, technological development has given way to a number of broad changes in communications and information technology. These changes have fundamentally altered the way we connect with one another, with the natural world, and with information. One of the most profound changes has been the rise of mobile computing, which has transformed how we communicate, access information, and consume media. Social media has arguably been the single most significant factor in encouraging and enabling these changes. One popular social network boasts more than 1 billion active users per month, with half of those users accessing the networks from mobile devices. As we increasingly turn to our mobile devices for information and communication, it becomes vital to understand how these technologies impact our relationship with the natural world.

q1.translation: 在过去的二十年里，技术的发展已经让位于通信和信息技术方面的一些广泛的变化。这些变化从根本上改变了我们与他人、与自然世界、与信息联系的方式。最深刻的变化之一是移动计算的兴起，它改变了我们交流、获取信息和消费媒体的方式。社交媒体可以说是鼓励和实现这些改变的最重要的因素。
q1.front: Over the past two decades, technological development has given way to a number of broad changes in communications and information technology. These changes have fundamentally altered the way we connect with one another, with the natural world, and with information. One of the most profound changes has been the rise of mobile computing, which has transformed how we communicate, access information, and consume media. Social media has arguably been the single most significant factor in encouraging and enabling these changes.
q1.content: Over the past two ____, technological development has ____ way to a number of broad changes in communications and ____ technology. These changes have fundamentally altered the ____ we connect with one another, with the natural ____, and ____ information. One of the most profound changes has been the rise of mobile computing, which has transformed ____ we communicate, access information, and consume media. Social media has arguably ____ the single most significant factor in encouraging and enabling these ____.

q2.translation: 在过去的二十年里，技术的发展已经让位于通信和信息技术方面的一些广泛的变化。这些变化从根本上改变了我们与他人、与自然世界、与信息联系的方式。最深刻的变化之一是移动计算的兴起，它改变了我们交流、获取信息和消费媒体的方式。社交媒体可以说是鼓励和实现这些改变的最重要的因素。一个流行的社交网络宣称每月有超过10亿的活跃用户，其中一半的用户通过移动设备访问网络。随着我们越来越多地使用移动设备进行信息和通信，了解这些技术如何影响我们与自然世界的关系变得至关重要。
q2.front: Over the past two decades, technological development has given way to a number of broad changes in communications and information technology. These changes have fundamentally altered the way we connect with one another, with the natural world, and with information. One of the most profound changes has been the rise of mobile computing, which has transformed how we communicate, access information, and consume media. Social media has arguably been the single most significant factor in encouraging and enabling these changes.

q2.ending: As we increasingly turn to our mobile devices for information and communication, it becomes vital to understand how these technologies impact our relationship with the natural world.

options.sentence: Social media users can use these networks to share new views, thoughts, pictures, videos, music, or other types of information.
Telephones and cellular phones are the most commonly used phones; these two examples of technology make up over 90% of all phone lines in the United States.
Every day we use a growing array of wireless devices besides cell phones to connect with others: digital cameras, fax machines, pagers, and wireless email.
One popular social network boasts more than 1 billion active users per month, with half of those users accessing the networks from mobile devices.

options.sentence: Digital communication technologies allow information to be shared, which can help people to learn about the natural environment and how they interact with it.
The rise of mobile computing has fundamentally changed how we communicate with one another and access and exchange information.
The study found that young people often engage in tech-mediated behaviors while taking a break from school, exercising, or engaged in other healthy activities.
The printing press, the rise of public education, and government institutions in the nineteenth century changed how people communicated with each other.
